name: CUBE RUSH 2
description:
Note: in this version are only 40 levels inside! this wil change in the upcomming update and if the controls are buggy please make sure you unplugged all of your gamepads!

CUBE RUSH 2 -Do you remember the old game machines from the 90s? then this game is right for you! I'm extremely geared to these arcades, have fun and if it has brought them in nostalgia let me know ^ ^

what will i do with the money?

---------------------------------------

I will continue to make games with this money AND I will also buy better equipment to optimize my games more and more. I will also use this money to make  games for PS4, XBOX one, Google Stadia, Steam, IOS, Andriod, MAC and Nintendo Switch because ... it can be very expensive and I will not use  copyright free music anymore,  if I have enough money, I will hire professional music composers!

was werde ich mit dem Geld machen? 

-------------------------------------------------

ich werde mit diesem Geld weitere spiele machen UND ich werde auch besseres Equipment kaufen, um meine Spiele immer besser zu Optimieren. Ich werde auch mit diesem geld Spiele für PS4, XBOX one, Google Stadia, Steam, IOS, Andriod, MAC und Nintendo Switch machen weil... es sehr teuer werden kann und außerdem werde ich dann auch nichtmehr Copyright freie musik nehmen, sondern wenn genug geld vorhanden ist, werde ich Professionelle Musik Komposer anheuern!

Minimum System requirements
----------------------------------------------------
CPU: AMD Ryzen 2,1GHz, Intel Celeron 2,8GHz
VRAM: 1GB
Memory: 2GB
Hard drive space: 150MB

Recommended System requirements
-------------------------------------------------------------
CPU: AMD Ryzen 5 2400g 3,9GHz  . Intel i5-9400F 3,4GHz
VRAM: 2GB
Memory: 4GB
Hard drive space:  150MB

Enjoy the game ^^
